alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 11:47PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Middlesex and southeastern New Haven Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Branford, or 11 miles north of Wading River, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Haven, Wallingford, Guilford, Clinton, Old Saybrook, Durham, Chester, Hamden, Cheshire, Branford, North Haven, North Branford, Haddam, Westbrook and Killingworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven
